We're delighted to share our Annual and Q4 Result FY'24. Highlighting key developments for the year:

- Crude Steel Production increased by 9% YoY, reaching 26.43 million tonnes
- Revenue increased by 5% YoY, generating Rs.1,75,006 crores
- EBITDA significantly rose to Rs. 28,236 crores, with a 52% YoY increase
- Net profit recorded a notable rise of 117% YoY, totalling Rs. 8973 crores

Q2 FY24 Consolidated Results:
